references.paper_title: Analysis of the parareal time-parallel time-integration method
references.reason: This paper provides a foundational analysis of the Parareal algorithm, a key method for parallel-in-time integration of differential equations, which is central to this paper's approach.

references.paper_title: Résolution d'EDP par un schéma en temps pararéel
references.reason: This is the seminal paper introducing the Parareal algorithm, which serves as the basis for many of the time-parallel methods discussed and improved in this paper.

references.paper_title: Nearest neighbors GParareal: Improving scalability of Gaussian processes for parallel-in-time solvers
references.reason: This paper, also authored by the current authors, introduces the nnGParareal algorithm, which directly precedes the work in the current paper and serves as a point of comparison and improvement.

references.paper_title: GParareal: a time-parallel ODE solver using Gaussian process emulation
references.reason: This paper is a key predecessor to the present work, introducing the GParareal algorithm that employs Gaussian Processes for correction, which the current authors improve upon with RandNet-Parareal.

references.paper_title: A hybrid parareal spectral deferred corrections method
references.reason: This paper presents a hybrid approach to solving PDEs by combining Parareal with spectral deferred corrections, which is relevant to the techniques explored in the present work.
